Sorry about that, as i was saying. I\'m Ghoul, I\'m new to the forum but not KSP. Thou i still havn\'t managed to even get a ship into orbit I spend to much time making fighter jets and ridiculous contraptions to remove debris from kearth. I recently over modded KSP and had to start from a clean vinilla version once again. So i figured this time I would join the forum rather than leech all the mods form it.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome! Just for future reference, Kearth, is actually Kerbin. Common noob mistake.

Also, There are many nice guides here for orbiting. I can link a YT video here:

Yeah haven\'t read to many posts, I think i saw it referred to kearth once and thought that is what it was called. Also thanks to YT vid.
Welcome Ghoul. I have the same problem, about once a week i install a fresh copy before i overburden it with too many mods. They\'re just so damn good.
